title: The best outfits Meghan Markle has worn on her royal tour of South Africa
text:
Meghan Markle is currently on a 10-day tour of Africa with Prince Harry and baby Archie.

It's the family's first working visit to the continent, and already the duchess has made an impression with her fashion choices.

From honoring a Malawi-based fashion brand to channeling Princess Diana, here are her best looks so far.

Visit Insider's homepage for more stories.

The Duchess of Sussex is currently on 10-day tour of Africa with Prince Harry and baby Archie, and her fashion choices have already made an impression.

So far, Meghan has reworn outfits from her pregnancy, honored a local African fashion brand, and even channeled Princess Diana.

Read more: Here's the full schedule for Meghan Markle and Prince Harry's first royal tour with baby Archie

Here are the best outfits worn by the duchess so far.
description: Meghan Markle wore a $116 belted trench dress for her final day of solo engagements in Johannesburg on Tuesday,
